fix: improve QGS import UX and add coordinate transformation

Major UX improvements for QGS import workflow:
- Add progress feedback during 3-minute backend processing
- Fix project sorting (newest first by created_at)
- Fix timestamp display (UTC to local Polish time)
- Add coordinate transformation (EPSG:2180 to EPSG:4326)
- Connect layer tree to Redux for real-time updates

Changes:
- feat(import): add ''processing'' step with clear message
- feat(projects): sort by created_at DESC in both tabs
- feat(timestamp): convert UTC to local time with Polish locale
- feat(coordinates): add proj4 transformation utilities
- feat(layers): connect LeftPanel to Redux state
- feat(api): complete RTK Query migration (52 endpoints)
- docs: add comprehensive documentation for all fixes

Files changed:
- CreateProjectDialog.tsx: Added processing step UI
- OwnProjects.tsx: Added project sorting logic
- PublicProjects.tsx: Added project sorting logic
- ProjectCard.tsx: Added UTC to local time conversion
- coordinates.ts: NEW coordinate transformation utilities
- LeftPanel.tsx: Connected to Redux layers state
- layersApi.ts: NEW RTK Query API for layers (29 endpoints)
- map/page.tsx: Added automatic coordinate transformation

Fixes:
- Invalid LngLat coordinate errors (EPSG:2180 vs EPSG:4326)
- Missing progress feedback during import
- Wrong timestamp display (2 hour difference)
- New projects not appearing at top of list
- Layer tree not loading imported layers
